feedback.content: Sold my power wheelchair to these folks in Tampa. They were knowledgeable about mobility equipment and offered a fair price. The transaction was smooth, and they were respectful throughout. Great service!
feedback.name: Patricia R.

feedback.content: These guys bought my electric wheelchair. The offer was reasonable, and they were accommodating with the pickup. Process was straightforward, but I wish they had more info upfront about their valuation method.
feedback.name: Robert J.

feedback.content: Sold my manual wheelchair to this company. They were professional, offered a decent price, and picked it up promptly. Appreciated their efficient service and understanding of different wheelchair types.
feedback.name: Susan M.

listAsq.title: What types of wheelchairs do you purchase?
listAsq.content: Our company is interested in purchasing various types of wheelchairs, including: manual, electric, folding, transport, and multifunctional models. We consider all brands and conditions.

listAsq.title: How do you determine a wheelchair's value?
listAsq.content: Our online valuation process is streamlined for your convenience. Simply contact us through any messaging platform (Telegram, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger) or social network (Instagram, Facebook) and send us photos along with a brief description (specifications, details, modifications). Within 5-7 minutes, you'll receive a competitive offer and a step-by-step plan for a quick sale.

listAsq.title: Do you purchase specialized, custom, or electric wheelchairs?
listAsq.content: Yes, we purchase specialized, custom, and electric wheelchairs. Our program covers a wide range of mobility devices, including those with custom modifications and advanced features. For a detailed assessment of your specific wheelchair, please contact our appraisal team for a fair valuation.

listAsq.title: How does the payment process work?
listAsq.content: The final stage of verification occurs after the appraiser's visit. If you accurately disclosed all details during the initial assessment via messenger, the price typically remains unchanged upon inspection. Payment is processed immediately following this step.

listAsq.title: Do you offer pickup services?
listAsq.content: Yes, we offer pickup services. We provide multiple transportation options for your convenience. You can either deliver the wheelchair to our office yourself, or we can send our employee to your location for evaluation and transportation. Additionally, we offer the option to ship the wheelchair by mail if that better suits your needs.

listAsq.title: Do you operate throughout the entire United States?
listAsq.content: While our network doesn't currently cover the entire United States, we are committed to serving customers from various regions. We can arrange pickup or postal delivery of wheelchairs as necessary. Please note that for more distant locations, the waiting time for our appraiser may increase by 1-2 days. We strive to provide quality service to every customer, regardless of location.
